1662960.name: Fantasy Grounds - Ghoul Island Act 1 Voyage to Farzeen
1662960.description:
Ghoul Island Act 1 Voyage to Farzeen

Sandy Petersen, the author of the Call of Cthulhu Role-playing game published byChaosium, changes the tabletop world once again with Sandy Petersen's Cthulhu Mythos -a complete sourcebook for all things Lovecraftian for 5 th edition fantasy.Ghoul Island is the first campaign adventure for Sandy Petersen's Cthulhu Mythos and canbe easily introduced into any fantasy setting. This first act (of four), Voyage to Farzeen,begins with a mutiny and ends in underground tunnels where our adventurers discover anancient temple dedicated to a horror thought to have been vanquished long ago!
Adapted for Fantasy Grounds by: George Botelho
Requires: The free Fantasy Grounds virtual tabletop (VTT) software and the included 5E Compatible ruleset.
Screenshots may differ from what you see in-game based on the extension and ruleset you have loaded.
